properties.name: bearer-authentication.keystore.location
properties.description: Keystore file (i.e.: jks/p12/keystore) location to be used for bearer token signing and verification.

properties.name: bearer-authentication.keystore.passphrase
properties.description: Keystore password.

properties.name: bearer-authentication.keystore.key-alias
properties.description: Alias for authentication key.

properties.name: bearer-authentication.keystore.private-key-passphrase
properties.description: Keystore's Private key password.

properties.name: bearer-authentication.token.access-token-validity
properties.description: Access token validity (i.e.: 30m,2h).

properties.name: bearer-authentication.token.refresh-token-validity
properties.description: Refresh token validity (i.e.: 30m,2h).

properties.name: bearer-authentication.token.mfa-token-validity
properties.description: MFA token validity (i.e.: 30m,2h).

properties.name: spring.datasource.authdb.driver-class-name
properties.description: Fully qualified JDBC driver classname for authdb.

properties.name: spring.datasource.authdb.url
properties.description: JDBC url for authdb.

properties.name: spring.datasource.authdb.username
properties.description: Database username for authdb.

properties.name: spring.datasource.authdb.password
properties.description: Database password for authdb.

properties.name: spring.datasource.authdb.hikari.driver-class-name
properties.description: Hikari connection pool fully qualified JDBC driver classname for authdb.

properties.name: spring.datasource.authdb.hikari.jdbc-url
properties.description: Hikari connection pool JDBC url for authdb.

properties.name: spring.datasource.authdb.hikari.username
properties.description: Hikari connection pool database username for authdb.

properties.name: spring.datasource.authdb.hikari.password
properties.description: Hikari connection pool database password for authdb.

properties.name: spring.datasource.authdb.hikari.pool-name
properties.description: Hikari connection pool name for authdb.

properties.name: spring.datasource.authdb.hikari.maximum-pool-size
properties.description: Hikari connection pool database max connection pool size for authdb.

properties.name: spring.datasource.authdb.hikari.minimum-idle
properties.description: Hikari connection pool database min idle connection pool size for authdb.

properties.name: spring.datasource.authdb.hikari.idle-timeout
properties.description: Hikari connection pool database connection idle timeout millis for authdb.

properties.name: spring.datasource.authdb.hikari.connection-timeout
properties.description: Hikari connection pool database connection timeout millis for authdb.

properties.name: spring.datasource.authdb.hikari.connection-test-query
properties.description: Hikari connection pool database connection test query for authdb.

properties.name: spring.datasource.userdb.driver-class-name
properties.description: Fully qualified JDBC driver classname for userdb.

properties.name: spring.datasource.userdb.url
properties.description: JDBC url for userdb.

properties.name: spring.datasource.userdb.username
properties.description: Database username for userdb.

properties.name: spring.datasource.userdb.password
properties.description: Database password for userdb.

properties.name: spring.datasource.userdb.hikari.driver-class-name
properties.description: Hikari connection pool fully qualified JDBC driver classname for userdb.

properties.name: spring.datasource.userdb.hikari.jdbc-url
properties.description: Hikari connection pool JDBC url for userdb.

properties.name: spring.datasource.userdb.hikari.username
properties.description: Hikari connection pool database username for userdb.

properties.name: spring.datasource.userdb.hikari.password
properties.description: Hikari connection pool database password for userdb.

properties.name: spring.datasource.userdb.hikari.pool-name
properties.description: Hikari connection pool name for userdb.

properties.name: spring.datasource.userdb.hikari.maximum-pool-size
properties.description: Hikari connection pool database max connection pool size for userdb.

properties.name: spring.datasource.userdb.hikari.minimum-idle
properties.description: Hikari connection pool database min idle connection pool size for userdb.

properties.name: spring.datasource.userdb.hikari.idle-timeout
properties.description: Hikari connection pool database connection idle timeout millis for userdb.

properties.name: spring.datasource.userdb.hikari.connection-timeout
properties.description: Hikari connection pool database connection timeout millis for userdb.

properties.name: spring.datasource.userdb.hikari.connection-test-query
properties.description: Hikari connection pool database connection test query for userdb.

properties.name: spring.datasource.userdb.hikari.read-only
properties.description: Set Read only mode for database connection.
